page.title: 20Tiers of Government: Alford
page.content: In 1983 Malcolm Bruce was elected Liberal MP for the Gordon constituency The MEP for NE Scotland is Ian Provan, a Tory. We have elected represent- atives on Grampian Regional Council and Gordon District Council. Closer to the grass roots each parish is represented on Donside Community Council, which keeps the Regional and District Councillors in touch with local concerns.Alford College Council is a locally elected body whose role is to make the Education Committee of the Region aware of the views of the locality on education matters. The Water and Roads depots for the area are in Alford as is the Council's local office which is the base for the Registrar, Community Education, Social worker, etc. Edna Matthew, Alford SWRI.
